original_text: Consequently, you are no longer foreigners and strangers, but fellow citizens with God’s people and also members of his household,
korean_text: 그러므로 이제부터 너희는 외인도 아니요 나그네도 아니요 오직 성도들과 동일한 시민이요 하나님의 권속이라

sentences.original_text: Consequently, you are no longer foreigners and strangers
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 너희는 더 이상 외인과 나그네가 아니요

sentences.original_text: but fellow citizens with God's people
and also members of his household
